translation.description: Curious about technology and it's possibilities.
translation.404: The page you were looking for was not found.
translation.aboutMe: Since my childhood, I have been passionate about technology, so I decided to combine the useful with the pleasant, and today I am a fullstack developer. I don't have formal experience, like CLT, but I am a freelancer with some projects I am working on. I am eager to learn day by day and improve every aspect that a true fullstack developer can offer.
translation.jvlfDescription: Website to show the fictitious PDTI/PSI 2025-26 of Banco do Brasil.
translation.medellinDescription: E-commerce of clothes and accessories. I participated in all development, from scratch to production, except for the UI.
translation.olieArtDescription: Simple portfolio website for a designer.
translation.restfulApiDescription: RESTful API that registers, retrieves, and updates students. Test-driven.
translation.facilitandoDescription: Webapp to manage passwords where you can save accounts and generate strong passwords.
translation.softSkillsCheckDescription: Developed by a team of volunteering people from the students of Faculdade Senac DF, I was the development leader of this webapp. This webapp provides soft skills self-assessments.
